com.netflix.genie.web.selectors

Interface ClusterSelector

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceSelector<Cluster,ClusterSelectionContext>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RandomClusterSelectorImpl, ScriptClusterSelectorImpl

    @Validated
public interface ClusterSelector
extends ResourceSelector<Cluster,ClusterSelectionContext>
    Interface for any classes which provide a way to select a Cluster from a set of clusters which matched criterion provided by a user in a JobRequest and combined with the criteria for the command selected for a given job.
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.netflix.genie.web.selectors.ResourceSelector

        select
